p: Since the first report that EV-A71 could infect newborn mice by intraperitoneal injection and cause paralysis, death, etc., in 1979, the EV-A71-infected mouse model has been optimized several times ( 12). Some studies investigated potential influence factors such as virus dose, challenge method, mouse strain, and mouse age. but the results showed that they cannot help to increase the virulence of EV-A71 ( 13).
